title: The Big Green Book of Italian Verbs
features: A colorful addition to the popular Big Book of Verbs series
What does
The Big Green Book of Italian Verbs

have that the competition doesn't? It has more verbs, a better selection of conjugations, more usage examples, and clearer presentation of tense formation and usage. Also, this book streamlines the learning process by indicating the principal parts and irregularities of each conjugated verb.
Destined to become the new verb bible for English students of Italian,
The Big Green Book of Italian Verbs
includes:
555 of the most useful Italian verbs, fully conjugated
555 of the most useful Italian verbs, fully conjugated
Tense names provided in English and Italian
Tense names provided in English and Italian
Example sentences for all 555 verbs
Example sentences for all 555 verbs
Full facing-page of contextual sentences for the top 50 verbs
Full facing-page of contextual sentences for the top 50 verbs
A two-page Formation and Usage spread for each tense
A two-page Formation and Usage spread for each tense
An index of the 2,700 most common verbs, cross-referenced to all 555 verbs
An index of the 2,700 most common verbs, cross-referenced to all 555 verbs
A list of confusing irregular forms and their infinitives
A list of confusing irregular forms and their infinitives
Plus verb tests and drills to improve competence
Plus verb tests and drills to improve competence
description: (Belgium) was recently an assistant professor of Italian at the University of Delaware and is now a lecturer in English at a university in Belgium.
(Belleville, IL) is an experienced editor of Italian textbooks.
